home.title: Welcome to EntiWin
home.description: EntiWin is an online game based on Google Maps that challenges you to find a place on a map from the images taken by Google Street View.
home.help: The game is based on Google Maps / Google Street View. The game requires players to guess their location in Tunisia using only the clues visible. The game has 10 rounds. To win, the player must obtain the minimum number of points required
game.confirm.title: Confirm
game.confirm.desc: Click here to confirm your answer
game.roundresult.desc: Your guess is {{ distance }} Km from the correct location
game.roundresult.lose: ‚ùå Too far! Better Luck Next Time...
game.ismobile.title: Sorry
game.ismobile.desc: This game is not supported by your device. This content can be viewed on a Large Screen or Tablet.
help.firststep: This is the map of Tunisia. Search the map for the location in the 360-degree photo. Click on the map to locate the appropriate place
help.secondstep: This is a random place in Tunisia. Try to find out the place on the map
help.leveldifficulty: Level of difficulty in the game. There are 3 levels: "Easy", "Medium" and "Hard"
help.yourscore: This is your score. To win, the player must obtain the minimum number of points required
help.rounds: number of rounds played. Each game contains 10 rounds
